name: @carbonvoice/cv-mcp-server
description: Server implementation for integrating with Carbon Voice's API, providing tools and endpoints for voice messaging, conversations, and workspace management through MCP (Model Context Protocol)
author: Carbon Voice

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && tsc && shx chmod +x dist/*.js
scripts.auto:build: env-cmd nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec npm run build
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push origin develop
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push origin develop
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push origin develop
scripts.release:patch: git checkout develop && git pull origin develop && npm run test && npm run build && npm version patch && git push origin develop && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main && git checkout develop
scripts.release:minor: git checkout develop && git pull origin develop && npm run test && npm run build && npm version minor && git push origin develop && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main && git checkout develop
scripts.release:major: git checkout develop && git pull origin develop && npm run test && npm run build && npm version major && git push origin develop && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main && git checkout develop
scripts.deploy:release: git checkout develop && git pull origin develop && npm run test && npm run build && git push origin develop && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main && git checkout develop
